titles.title: Taiwan Non-Discrimination Act of 2025
Taiwan Non-Discrimination Act of 2025
Taiwan Non-Discrimination Act of 2025
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to pursue more equitable treatment of Taiwan at the international financial institutions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 48 - 0.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 119-20.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 10.

committee.name: House Financial Services
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: International monetary system and foreign exchange
Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status
